amendment.description: To improve the section providing support for artificial intelligence under the Broadband Equity, Access, and Deployment Program.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2602 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 2602 proposed by Senator Cruz for Senator Blackburn to Amendment SA 2360.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2602 proposed by Senator Cruz for Senator Blackburn to Amendment SA 2360.
